original_text: And wherefore discourage ye the heart of the children of Israel from going over into the land which the Lord hath given them?
korean_text: 너희가 어찌하여 이스라엘 자손에게 낙심하게 하여서 여호와께서 그들에게 주신 땅으로 건너갈 수 없게 하려 하느냐

sentences.original_text: the heart of the children of Israel
from going over into the land
which the Lord hath given them?
